answers.answer: maybe they just want to make sure. if they checked on early in your pregnancy, it could have developed later on.. and my cervix was checked when they did the group b strep test, it was 36 weeks.

How far along are you? My Dr. Told me I could take the glucose test till I was at least 27 weeks. Also I think someone said that they start checking you for being dialated at 36 weeks but don't quote me because I am not sure.
They r making me do it again to. The first time was to check early because I'm not skinny or that average weight to them so now they want me to do it again when it's usually supposed to be done
I will be 33 weeks tomorrow i was suppose to do the test awhile ago but bc of work i wasn't able to until now and what's a group b step test?
They just swab your vagina and near your anus for strep b virus. Might get blood drawn, can't remember if you do or not.
Umm eww lol better stay away from my butt! Lol
Whats the stress test and why do they do it and when do they?
Group b strep test they just swab your vagina and anus, I didn't get blood taken. I was nervous at first but it went by fast. They usually only do a stress test if you're overdue I think.

question: Im getting the diabetes test done for the 2nd time and idk y,they gave it to me in the beginning of my pregnancy and they said it was fine so y do i have to do it again?2nd question-when will the dr. Check to see if I've thinned out.
title: 2 questions
